arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Lee, Ndjantou, Ramos…the ups and downs !
arts.sum: This Sunday evening, Paris Saint-Germain drew 1-1 against Lille in Matchday 7 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 at the Stade Pierre Mauroy. Here are the highlights and flops of this draw. Ups – Lee Kang-In was super active. Sometimes timid at PSG, the Korean was very present this time in the Parisian game. Defensively too. […]

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Perraud frustrated, he doesn’t mince his words
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 7 of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain faced Lille at the Stade Pierre Mauroy. Romain Perraud, 28-year-old left-back for Lille, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 1-1 draw. Perraud: “We can’t be satisfied with that.” Any regrets? Yes, of course, but in terms of scoring, it’s still a good […]

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – “We need to improve collectively,” Pacho’s strong words
arts.sum: Willian Pacho, 23-year-old Paris Saint-Germain defender, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 1-1 draw against Lille this Sunday at the Stade Pierre Mauroy as part of Matchday 7 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – André tackles his teammates “a strange match”

arts.ttl: Lille vs PSG – Luis Enrique congratulates the youngsters despite frustration
